name: holygrailmin
description: A minimal, responsive, style-agnostic CSS framework.

scripts.start: npm run format && npm run docs && npm run build && npm run open:guide
scripts.build: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.css && sass scss/docs.scss doc/docs.css --style expanded && node add-name-version-package.js
scripts.build:min: sass scss/style.scss dist/style.min.css --style compressed && node add-name-version-package.js
scripts.build-sass: sass --style expanded --source-map true scss/style.scss dist/style.css && node add-name-version-package.js && sass --output-style expanded --source-map true scss/docs.scss doc/docs.css
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run build:min

author: Manuel Ruiz
